refnamediv.refpurpose: Apply expression to compute new attribute values

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Use the apply operator to compute new values from attributes and indexes of input arrays. The value(s) computed in the apply are appended to the attributes in the input array.

informalexample.para: This example computes new attributes for an existing array.

step.para: Create an array called distance with an attribute called miles:CREATE ARRAY distance <miles:double> [i=0:9,10,0];

Apply the expression 1.6 * miles to distance and name the result kilometers:apply(distance,kilometers,1.6*miles);This query returns:[(100,160), (200,320), (300,480), (400,640), (500,800), (600,960), (700,1120), (800,1280), (900,1440), (1000,1600)]
